data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: In a nutshell, the business is about to go bankrupt. If ____ don't ____ a ____ change, we'll ____ to ____ down ____ as ____ as ____ month. To ____ this ____, I strongly ____ a ____ of ____. Our investors do not have confidence in our current leaders, but they may change their minds with a change at the top.
data.partBlankContent: In a nutshell, the business is about to go bankrupt. If w_ don't ma__ a dra____ change, we'll ha__ to sh__ down opera_____ as ea___ as ne__ month. To pre____ this fa__, I strongly reco_____ a cha___ of owne_____. Our investors do not have confidence in our current leaders, but they may change their minds with a change at the top.
data.answer: 简而言之，这家公司就要破产了。如果我们不做出重大改变，我们将不得不关闭近一个月的运营。为了防止这种失败，我强烈建议更改所有权。我们的投资者对我们的现任领导人没有信心，但他们可能会改变主意，更换高层。
